title: Mobile Web Performance Hits You Didn't Know About
summary: Stop spending hours shaving milliseconds of your load time when there are some things that can contribute 500ms or more of latency to your mobile apps. I'll touch on a few things you might not have been aware of that can affect the performance of your internet connected mobile apps.
